name: General Soccer Trivia Game | Soccer | 5 Questions

questions.text: Which South American Football Club played their home games at the Alberto J. Armando Stadium in 2001?
questions.explanation:
Boca Juniors.

	Alberto J. Armando was the club's Chairman 1954-56 and 1960-1981. Also known as La Bombonera, 'The Chocolate Box'. Capacity of 57,395. Boca Juniors moved to this ground in 1924.

questions.text: Which French team played at Stade Felix-Bollaert Stadium in 2001?
questions.explanation:
Lens.

	Capacity of 41,275 which is small for soccer.

questions.text: What Spanish team play at the San Mames Stadium in 2001?
questions.explanation:
Athletic Bilbao.

	Bilbao Famously only sign players from the basque region of Spain.  It has a capacity of 40,000.

questions.text: At what ground did Italian side Chievo Verona play their home games  in 2001?
Where was the 2002 European Champions League Final held?
